title: Add direct case card navigation from Dashboard

requirements.text: In the DashboardView component, make each task group clickable so that clicking on a case's task section navigates directly to that specific case card in the Cases list view

quotes: From the Dashboard view, add a way to directly access a case card

acceptanceCriteria: Each case task group in the Dashboard is clickable
Clicking a case task group switches to the Cases list view
The target case card is scrolled into view and visually highlighted
Navigation works for all cases displayed in the Dashboard

requirements.text: Add visual affordance (hover state, cursor pointer, or subtle styling) to case task groups in the Dashboard to indicate they are clickable
acceptanceCriteria: Hover state provides clear visual feedback
Cursor changes to pointer when hovering over case task groups
Styling is consistent with the existing light blue theme

constraints: Maintain existing Dashboard layout and task display format
Do not modify the backend main.mo file
Preserve color-coded task badges and existing styling
nonGoals: Changing how tasks are calculated or displayed
Adding search or filter functionality to the Dashboard
